name: ascii-frog
description: ASCII Frog Generator - A fun web service to generate colorful ASCII art frogs

scripts.predev: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ..
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run sync-versions && git add . && git commit -m "chore: bump version to $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")"
scripts.sync-versions: node -e "const v=require('./package.json').version; const fs=require('fs'); ['frontend','backend'].forEach(d=>{const p=require('./' + d + '/package.json'); p.version=v; fs.writeFileSync(d + '/package.json', JSON.stringify(p,null,2))})"
